texts: {"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Your address change request has been submitted"}
We aim to respond to you within the next 10 working days.
We will review your application along with your supporting documents and let you know if your address change request has been successful.
If we do not have the correct supporting documents we will not be able to make the change to your address details, and your residents' discount may be cancelled.
If you are sending copies of your documents by post, please either:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Print this page and send it with your documents OR","Quote your account number on each piece of correspondence"]}
This will speed up the application process.
If you prefer to email images or copies of your documents, send them to:
You will need to submit your documents within the next 10 working days or your request will be cancelled and you may become ineligible for the discount.
We will review your application along with your supporting documents and let you know if your address change request has been successful.
If we do not have the correct supporting documents we will not be able to make the change to your address details, and your residents' discount may be cancelled.
